A

authenticate(String, String, char[], PasswordValidator) - Method in class org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.authenticator.jdbc.JdbcPasswordAuthenticator
Authenticate a user by validating the user's password, returning a Subject with one or more Principals set (if validation was successful), or throw a LoginException (if validation fails)

This method connects to the database as configured in the the configuration provided during initialization, and uses the configured parameterized SQL query to retrieve a user's ID and credential using the provided userName and domain to locate them in the database.

close(Connection) - Static method in class org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.authenticator.jdbc.DbUtil

This authenticator performs validation of username / password type credentials against JDBC databases.

O

org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.authenticator.jdbc - package org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.authenticator.jdbc
Provides a JAAS modules that can validate credentials against any JDBC database.
